nodes.text: Froera was a female Wookiee who, with her mother Attiera, was part of the Myyydril tribe shortly before the Clone Wars.

Froera appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
